name: Riley'sUnitedStatesTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open Riley's Trivia”
”Alexa, play Riley's Trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: riley's trivia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Test your knowledge of United States history.

History Trivia provides a fun way to keep your U.S. history skills sharp.

You can also ask Alexa about any of the fifty states.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Riley's Trivia" or "Alexa, open Riley's Trivia" to start the game.

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
